comment._content: This one can be dated: June 23, 1911 (notation in upper-right corner).

comment._content: Wow, what a wonderful informal photo -- it really catches a summer moment.

comment._content: They look so happy ! I "tumblred" this photograph and credited you, indeed. encorepetite.tumblr.com/ x x x ___mathyld___

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Other Bain/LOC photos taken during the Midsummer Day Festival of the girls of Washington Irving High School, on June 23, 1911 in Bronx Park [Corrected on some photos to Pelham Bay Park]: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2163520196/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2163519956/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2162717579/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2162718041/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2162714589/in/photostream/] Story in The New York Times, June 24, 1911 [scrolling required]: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9A02E1DA1E3EE2...
